title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Proposal (1 point)

  • The (genetic/heritable) capacity to sustain dives for longer periods of time provides selective/reproductive advantages (access to food/avoidance of predators) for seals but not for penguins.
descriptions:
